name: Space War demo
description:
"WASD" for move.

Auto shoot aiming where mouse points to.

Two skills available on mouse_left and mouse_right.

Overload: 

Press mouse_left to increase the moving and shooting speed until you run out of energy, but you will be slower during reload process after overload.

Teleport:

Press and hold mouse_right to create a area where enemies and enemy bullets will be slower, during this time (3s), you are available to release mouse_right and teleport to mouse location in the area created.
